pizzas.name: bagel pizza
pizzas.description: the classic: your choice of bagel, topped with organic roasted garlic marinara, itali-blend cheese, and secret spices. ~Or build your own + 3 toppings

pizzas.name: na'an-a-mia (na'an-pizza-pocket)
pizzas.description: na'an topped with olive oil, marinara, spinach, feta, and our itali-blend cheese

pizzas.name: na'an-a-cita (mexican-na'an-pizza-pocket)
pizzas.description: na'an topped with olive oil, badass salsa, spinach, chili, and our mexi-blend cheese

pizzas.name: na'an-a-white
pizzas.description: na'an topped with olive oil, cream cheese, spinach, mushrooms, and our itali-blend cheese

pizzas.name: BYO-na'an pizza (byo-na'an-pizza-pocket)
pizzas.description: na'an topped with olive oil, your choice of 4 toppings, AND Italian- or Mexi-style!

pizzas.name: el tejano
pizzas.description: jalapeno-cheddar bagel topped with mexi-blend cheese, served with a side of badass salsa for dipping

pizzas.name: na'an-a-suprema
pizzas.description:
double-decker na'an pizza

layer 1: olive oil, badass salsa, and mexi-blend cheese

layer 2: olive oil, marinara, spinach, chili, portobello mushrooms, feta cheese, and itali-blend cheese

vegan.name: chili
vegan.description: our own top-secret, world-famous, made-from-scratch recipe! veggie-burger crumbles, roasted veggies, and spices. totally vegan! served with organic blue corn chips. + de-veganize it with cheese if you wish

vegan.name: hummus
vegan.description: vegan-friendly and made from scratch; traditional or today’s feature, lightly chilled and served with toasted na'an

vegan.name: quinoa salad
vegan.description: awesomely-vegan rosemary & olive oil quinoa, chilled, with fresh spinach red onion, cucumber, tomato, and baked tofu served w/ toasted pita. + de-veganize w/ feta cheese

mexi.name: blue corn nachos
mexi.description:
organic blue corn chips, mexi-blend cheese + badass salsa
~Or build your own + 3 toppings

mexi.name: quesadilla
mexi.description:
cheese + badass salsa.
~Or build your own + 3 toppings

mexi.name: messy tacos
mexi.description:
2 or 3 soft tacos; chili, spinach, mexi-cheese + chips + badass salsa
~go vegan without the cheese!

mexi.name: chips y salsa
mexi.description: blue corn chips + our homemade badass salsa

sandwiches.name: hummus sandwich
sandwiches.description: vegan-friendly on toasted whole grain bread; your choice of traditional hummus or today’s feature, w/ 4 toppings + blue corn chips

sandwiches.name: toasted cheese sandwich
sandwiches.description: multi-cheese blend on toasted whole grain bread with your choice of 2 toppings + blue corn chips

breakfasty.name: omelette
breakfasty.description: 2 eggs, cheese, w/ 3 toppings + muffnut / blue corn chips + badass salsa

breakfasty.name: breakfast taco
breakfasty.description: 2 eggs, cheese, w/ 3 toppings + blue corn chips + badass salsa

breakfasty.name: bp3 (breakfast-pita-pizza-pocket)
breakfasty.description: pita bread topped with olive oil, badass salsa, one egg, black beans, spinach, mexi- and itali-blend cheeses
